00050 #ifndef SC_INT_IDS_H
00051 #define SC_INT_IDS_H
00052 
00053 
00054 #include "sysc/utils/sc_report.h"
00055 
00056 
00057 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 //  Report ids (datatypes/int)
00059 //
00060 //  Report ids in the range of 400-499.
00061 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 
00063 #ifndef SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE
00064 #define SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE(id,unused1,unused2) \
00065     namespace sc_core { extern SC_API const char id[]; }
00066 extern SC_API const char SC_ID_REGISTER_ID_FAILED_[]; // in sc_report_handler.cpp
00067 #endif
00068 
00069 
00070 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_INIT_FAILED_, 400, "initialization failed" )
00071 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_ASSIGNMENT_FAILED_, 401, "assignment failed" )
00072 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_OPERATION_FAILED_, 402, "operation failed" )
00073 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_CONVERSION_FAILED_, 403, "conversion failed" )
00074 
00075 
00076 
00077 
00078 #endif
